examples: I couldn't bear the thought of waiting any longer.
No podía soportar la idea de esperar más.
The very thought of it makes me feel sick.
El solo pensarlo me hace sentir mal.
I don't like the thought of you walking home alone.
No me gusta la idea de que camines sola a casa.
She was struck by the sudden thought that he might already have left.
Le sorprendió la repentina idea de que tal vez ya se había ido.
